reviewText: This video was beyond bad.  Two ten year olds could have made a film with more substance or emotion than this thing.  We threw it away.  A terrible waste of money.

This is really a cute video.  Collette is having second thoughts about her wish to remain a virgin until her wedding night.  The movie opens with the morning after a night when, after a few drinks, Collette loses her resolve and tries to get Tom's pants off.  Tom resists her advances, and declares that he will help her keep her vow, by keeping her restrained whenever they are alone.

She wakes up nude but for handcuffs and leg irons.  Tom brings her coffee, and holds her cup while she drinks it, then helps her get ready for the day, brushing her hair and even brushing her teeth.  Through all this, she alternates between being really frustrated, enjoying the attention and the fact that he is helping with her vow, and using it as an excuse to be even more provocative, trying to get him to break down and take her.

It is clear that Tom is not just doing this out of duty, but that he really enjoys keeping Collette bound and naked (she looks great in chains), and watching her sexuality smolder as the sexual tension gets higher and higher.  He is looking forward to their wedding night, and ensuring that it will be explosive. (Unfortunately, we don't get to see that part :-) ).

You won't see any actual sex in this video, but then, that's kind of the whole point of this video.  Both Tom and Collette are easy on the eye, and the interaction between them is fun. Collette is a cute brunette with long hair, a pretty smile, a fun, teasing manner, and several tasteful tattoos. Tom is tall and muscular.

Like most of Felix's videos, this would be a good video to introduce a partner to bondage.  It is sexy, but in a chaste way, and shouldn't be too scary to the uninitiated.
